verses.verse: Moreover the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> came unto me <WH559>, saying,

Also <WH1121>, you son of man <WH120>, thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069> unto the land <WH127> of Israel <WH3478>; A end <WH7093>, the end <WH7093> is come <WH935> upon the four <WH702> corners <WH3671> of the land <WH776>.

Now is the end <WH7093> come upon you <WH7971>, and I will send my anger <WH639> upon you <WH8199>, and will judge you according to your ways <WH1870>, and will recompense <WH5414> upon you all your abominations <WH8441>.

And my eye <WH5869> shall not spare <WH2347> you <WH2550>, neither will I have pity: but I will recompense <WH5414> your ways <WH1870> upon you <WH8441>, and your abominations shall be in the midst <WH8432> of you <WH3045>: and you shall know that I am the Lord <WH3068>.
Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>; A evil <WH7451>, a only <WH259> evil <WH7451>, behold <WH935>, is come.
A end <WH7093> is come <WH935>, the end <WH7093> is come <WH935>: it watches <WH6974> for you <WH935>; behold, it is come.

The morning <WH6843> is come <WH935> unto you <WH3427>, O you that dwell in the land <WH776>: the time <WH6256> is come <WH935>, the day <WH3117> of trouble <WH4103> is near <WH7138>, and not the sounding again <WH1906> of the mountains <WH2022>.

Now will I shortly <WH7138> pour out <WH8210> my fury <WH2534> upon you <WH3615>, and accomplish my anger <WH639> upon you <WH8199>: and I will judge you according to your ways <WH1870>, and will recompense <WH5414> you for all your abominations <WH8441>.

And my eye <WH5869> shall not spare <WH2347>, neither will I have pity <WH2550>: I will recompense <WH5414> you according to your ways <WH1870> and your abominations <WH8441> that are in the midst <WH8432> of you <WH3045>; and you shall know that I am the Lord <WH3068> that strikes <WH5221>.
Behold the day <WH3117>, behold <WH935>, it is come: the morning <WH6843> is gone forth <WH3318>; the rod <WH4294> has blossomed <WH6692>, pride <WH2087> has budded <WH6524>.

Violence <WH2555> is risen up <WH6965> into a rod <WH4294> of wickedness <WH7562>: none of them shall remain <WH1995>, nor of their multitude, nor of any <WH1991> of theirs <WH5089>: neither shall there be wailing for them.

The time <WH6256> is come <WH935>, the day <WH3117> draws near <WH5060>: let not the buyer <WH7069> rejoice <WH8055>, nor the seller <WH4376> mourn <WH56>: for wrath <WH2740> is upon all the multitude there <WH1995>.

For the seller <WH4376> shall not return <WH7725> to that which is sold <WH4465>, although they were yet alive <WH2416>: for the vision <WH2377> is touching the whole multitude <WH1995> there <WH7725>, which shall not return; neither shall any <WH376> strengthen <WH2388> himself in the iniquity <WH5771> of his life <WH2416>.
They have blown <WH8628> the trumpet <WH8619>, even to make all ready <WH3559>; but none goes <WH1980> to the battle <WH4421>: for my wrath <WH2740> is upon all the multitude there <WH1995>.

The sword <WH2719> is outside <WH2351>, and the pestilence <WH1698> and the famine <WH7458> inside <WH1004>: he that is in the field <WH7704> shall die <WH4191> with the sword <WH2719>; and he that is in the city <WH5892>, famine <WH7458> and pestilence <WH1698> shall devour him <WH398>.

But they that escape <WH6403> of them shall escape <WH6412>, and shall be on the mountains <WH2022> like doves <WH3123> of the valleys <WH1516>, all of them mourning <WH1993>, every one <WH376> for his iniquity <WH5771>.
All hands <WH3027> shall be feeble <WH7503>, and all knees <WH1290> shall be weak <WH3212> as water <WH4325>.

They shall also clothe <WH2296> themselves with sackcloth <WH8242>, and horror <WH6427> shall cover <WH3680> them <WH955>; and shame shall be upon all faces <WH6440>, and baldness <WH7144> upon all their heads <WH7218>.

They shall cast <WH7993> their silver <WH3701> in the streets <WH2351>, and their gold <WH2091> shall be removed <WH5079>: their silver <WH3701> and their gold <WH2091> shall not be able <WH3201> to deliver <WH5337> them in the day <WH3117> of the wrath <WH5678> of the Lord <WH3068>: they shall not satisfy <WH7646> their souls <WH5315>, neither fill <WH4390> their bowels <WH4578>: because it is the stumblingblock <WH4383> of their iniquity <WH5771>.

As for the beauty <WH6643> of his ornament <WH5716>, he set <WH7760> it in majesty <WH1347>: but they made <WH6213> the images <WH6754> of their abominations <WH8441> and of their detestable things <WH8251> in it <WH5414>: therefore have I set it far from them <WH5079>.

And I will give <WH5414> it into the hands <WH3027> of the strangers <WH2114> for a prey <WH957>, and to the wicked <WH7563> of the earth <WH776> for a plunder <WH7998>; and they shall pollute it <WH2490>.
My face <WH6440> will I turn <WH5437> also from them <WH2490>, and they shall pollute my secret <WH6845> place <WH6530>: for the robbers shall enter <WH935> into it <WH2490>, and defile it.
Make <WH6213> a chain <WH7569>: for the land <WH776> is full <WH4390> of bloody <WH1818> crimes <WH4941>, and the city <WH5892> is full <WH4390> of violence <WH2555>.

Therefore I will bring <WH935> the worst <WH7451> of the heathen <WH1471>, and they shall possess <WH3423> their houses <WH1004>: I will also make the pomp <WH1347> of the strong <WH5794> to cease <WH7673>; and their holy places <WH6942> shall be defiled <WH2490>.
Destruction <WH7089> comes <WH935>; and they shall seek <WH1245> peace <WH7965>, and there shall be none.

Mischief <WH1943> shall come <WH935> upon mischief <WH1943>, and rumour <WH8052> shall be upon rumour <WH8052>; then shall they seek <WH1245> a vision <WH2377> of the prophet <WH5030>; but the law <WH8451> shall perish <WH6> from the priest <WH3548>, and counsel <WH6098> from the ancients <WH2205>.

The king <WH4428> shall mourn <WH56>, and the prince <WH5387> shall be clothed <WH3847> with desolation <WH8077>, and the hands <WH3027> of the people <WH5971> of the land <WH776> shall be troubled <WH926>: I will do <WH6213> unto them after their way <WH1870>, and according to their deserts <WH4941> will I judge <WH8199> them <WH3045>; and they shall know that I am the Lord <WH3068>.
